ext_desc.message: Add the ability to add, delete, and download emojis to Slack.

empty_message.message: Add the first emoji to use the "Slack Custom Emoji Manager".

bulk_remove_confirm.message: Are you sure you want to remove all the emojis?

bulk_remove_confirm_desc.message: This will remove all custom emojis for all members of the workspace.

bulk_remove_confirm_sub_desc.message:
* It is recommended that you download all emojis before deleting them.
* This process can take quite a while.

dropzone_dict.message:
Drag and drop some emojis you want to add here.
"emoji.png" will be added as "emoji".

never_opened_slack__open_slack.message: First, open your Slack workspace from here!

never_opened_slack__reload.message: If it is already open, please reload your browser.

option_reload_to_reflect_option.message: Please reload your browser to apply the settings.
